definitions.definition: Any of the days of a week on which work is done; any day in a workweek . The five workdays in many countries are usually Monday to Friday (and are defined as such in official and legal usage even though many people work on weekends).
examples: It will take five workdays to process your application.

definitions.definition: That part of a day in which work is done.

main_definition: ( chiefly US ) Any of the days of a week on which work is done; any day in a workweek . The five workdays in many countries are usually Monday to Friday (and are defined as such in official and legal usage even though many people work on weekends).
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly US ) That part of a day in which work is done.
